formula: a(n) ~ (-1)^(n+1) * tanh(1) * cos(Pi*tanh(1)/2) * 2^(2*n) * n^(2*n-1) / exp(2*n). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 31 2013
mathematica: Table[n!*SeriesCoefficient[Sin[ArcSinh[x]*Tan[x]],{x,0,n}],{n,0,40,2}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 31 2013 *)With[{nn=30},Take[CoefficientList[Series[Sin[ArcSinh[x]Tan[x]],{x,0,nn}], x] Range[0,nn]!,{1,-1,2}]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 24 2015 *)
